Utils¶

A collection of random little utilities and errors used throughout mastml

class utils.BetweenFilter(min_level, max_level)[source]¶

inclusive on both sides

exception utils.ConfError[source]¶

error in conf file

exception utils.FiletypeError[source]¶

for using the wrong file extentions

exception utils.InvalidConfParameters[source]¶

invalid conf params

exception utils.InvalidConfSection[source]¶

invalid section name

exception utils.InvalidConfSubSection[source]¶

invalid section name

exception utils.InvalidModel[source]¶

Model does not exist

exception utils.MastError[source]¶

base class for errors that should be shown to the user

exception utils.MissingColumnError[source]¶

raised when your csv doesn’t have the column you asked for

utils._rfe_train_test(rfe, estimator, X, y, train, test, scorer)[source]¶

Return the score for a fit across one fold.

utils.activate_logging(savepath, paths, logger_name='mastml', to_screen=True, to_file=True, verbosity=0)[source]¶

savepath is a dir for where to save log paths list of 3 strings we show so the user knows what is being ran verbosity: argument for what is shown on screen (does not affect files):

0 shows everything -1 hides debug -2 hides info (so no stdout except print) -3 hides warning -4 hides error -5 hides all output
utils.nice_range(lower, upper)[source]¶

Pass in two numbers, and get back a list of numbers, including both endpoints. Uses nice looking steps, ie 0.1 or 0.5 or sometimes 2.
